text: new paragraph condominiums powers of unit owners association amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iii the following new paragraph if any unit owner or the unit owner s relative or business where a unit owner or the unit owner s relative is the owner or director of a business or has a pecuniary interest in a business bids or contracts for the provision of goods or services to be provided with their unit owners association the unit owner shall recuse himself or herself from any participation in or vote on the awarding of the contract the unit owners association shall disclose to its unit owners the relationship of any unit owner or business where a unit owner is the owner or director of a business or has a pecuniary interest in a business with the contract for the provision of goods or services by mail to all unit owners as well as posting at all entrances and exits of all buildings controlled by the association this paragraph shall not apply to a unit owners association in which owners own time sharing interests
